Calculator
==========

The ``Calculator`` class contains the framework for user plugin interactions using data classes ``CalculatorContext`` and ``CalculatorCommand``

.. autoclass:: symcalc.Calculator
    :members:
    :member-order: bysource

.. autoclass:: symcalc.CalculatorContext
    :members:
    :member-order: bysource

.. autoclass:: symcalc.CalculatorCommand
    :members:
    :member-order: bysource
